profile.name: Anouzla Yassine
profile.title: Data Scientist & AI Engineer
profile.summary: I am a Data Scientist and AI Engineer passionate about transforming data into intelligent, actionable systems. With a strong background in statistics, business intelligence, and software engineering, I design and implement AI-driven applications, multi-agent architectures, and automated analytics pipelines that bridge research and industry. My expertise spans machine learning, NLP, computer vision, and data engineering, with proven success in developing solutions such as semantic plagiarism detection, real-time video analysis, smart AR interfaces, and forecasting models. Combining creativity with precision, I help organizations leverage AI to automate decision-making, uncover insights, and optimize performance across industrial, educational, and enterprise domains.

education.program: Specialized Master's Degree in Data Sciences (DS)
Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics & Business Intelligence

internship_period.description: 7-month internship focused on applied AI systems, automation pipelines, and LLM-based applications.

highlights: Transitioned from a 7-month internship to a full-time Data Scientist & AI Engineer position.
Developed multi-agent automation systems and intelligent assistants for lifecycle orchestration.
Built data-driven solutions in Generative AI, deep learning, NLP, and analytics.
Integrated LLMs, computer vision pipelines, and reinforcement learning agents in enterprise projects.
Designed automation workflows using CrewAI, LangChain, Zapier, and n8n.

experience.organization: High Commission for Planning — Laayoune Regional Directorate
highlights: Conducted statistical data analysis and visualization for regional development indicators.
Performed data cleaning and technical reporting using Python and Excel.
Provided IT technical support and maintained system reliability for retail operations.
Collaborated with the technical team to ensure smooth IT infrastructure performance.
Created a carpooling website with user management and booking features.
Gained early exposure to enterprise IT systems and data management workflows.

projects.title: Multi-Agent Chatbot for Industry Applications
projects.summary: Designed a real-time chatbot capable of interacting with industrial equipment using multi-agent systems.

projects.title: YOLO-OBB Road Sign Detection System
projects.summary: Built a computer vision model using YOLO-OBB and multi-scale tiling to detect road signs from complex plan PDFs.

projects.title: Hospital Data Enrichment System
projects.summary: Developed a multi-agent system that retrieves and compiles hospital information (leadership, revenue, staff, insurance, and contact data) from multiple sources.

projects.title: Plagiarism Detection System (Words and Semantics)
projects.summary: Designed a Django-based NLP system using semantic similarity and reinforcement learning for plagiarism detection.

projects.title: Real-Time Violence Detection in Videos
projects.summary: Implemented MoBiNet-based system in Django for detecting violent scenes in real-time video streams.

projects.title: Smart UI with AR and LLM Integration
projects.summary: Built an AR-enhanced educational UI powered by OpenAI and LangChain to generate adaptive learning questions.

projects.title: Stock Forecasting System for Moroccan Companies
projects.summary: Machine learning system for predicting Moroccan stock trends using time-series analysis.

projects.title: Decision Support System on Palestine–Israel Conflict
projects.summary: Developed an AI-powered analytical dashboard for geopolitical decision-making.

projects.title: Contour-Based Image Segmentation System
projects.summary: Segmentation system for detecting architectural structures in urban environments using optimized preprocessing techniques.

projects.title: Community Detection in Graph Networks
projects.summary: Designed ML models for identifying and classifying communities and influential nodes in complex networks.

projects.title: Tech E-commerce Website and Java Dashboard
projects.summary: Built an e-commerce platform for tech products with integrated sales dashboards.

projects.title: Automated Statistical Reporting Pipeline
projects.summary: Created automated workflows with n8n to generate, format, and email statistical summaries.

Real-time inference and monitoring pipelines
